name: Breath of Fire 6
summary: Breath of Fire 6: Hakuryū no Shugosha-tachi was a free-to-play online, web-based role-playing video game with microtransactions developed and published by Capcom as the sixth main installment of its Breath of Fire series. The game was released in Japan on February 24, 2016 for Microsoft Windows computers and Android devices, with an iOS release following on July 12, 2016.

alternative_names.name: Breath of Fire 6: Guardians of the White Dragon
ブレスオブファイア6 白竜の守護者たち
Breath of Fire 6: Hakuryū no Shugosha-tachi
